checkbox.name: Compact UI
checkbox.desc: If checked, will only display the health bar and score, so it doesn't clutter the screen a lot

checkbox.name: Points Based On Timing
checkbox.desc: If checked, the score will not be fixed to a note's judgement, forcing you to play better (trust), added in Base Game v0.3.0

checkbox.name: Tougher Combo Breaks
checkbox.desc: If checked, hitting a 'Bad' or 'Shit' will reset your combo, added in Base Game v0.3.0

checkbox.name: Sustains as One Note
checkbox.desc: If checked, missing a hold note won't leave the rest of the pieces to be missed so you dont get 3 million misses from just one note

checkbox.name: Middlescroll
checkbox.desc: If checked, player notes will be in the middle of the screen

checkbox.name: Hold Covers
checkbox.desc: If checked, holding a note will show a special effect, added in Base Game v0.3.0

checkbox.name: Subtitles
checkbox.desc: If checked, will show subtitles, what else do you expect..?

number.name: Bumpscocity
number.desc: Controls how bumpscocious the gameplay is.
